LanguageData.AlphaStimulantHigh.label: alpha stimulant
LanguageData.AlphaStimulantHigh.description: Alpha stimulant in the bloodstream. Subject's capacities are boosted for approximately 3 days. Unlike omega stimulant, subject won't suffer any negative effects.
LanguageData.AlphaStimulantHigh.stages.decline.label: decline
LanguageData.AlphaStimulantHigh.stages.peak.label: peak
LanguageData.OmegaStimulantHigh.label: omega stimulant
LanguageData.OmegaStimulantHigh.description: Omega stimulant in the bloodstream. Despite granting a huge strength, endurance and consciousness buffs at first, it soon backfires with extreme pain, delirium and, at the end, brain hemorrhage and, therefore, death.
LanguageData.OmegaStimulantHigh.stages.peak.label: peak
LanguageData.OmegaStimulantHigh.stages.decline.label: decline
LanguageData.OmegaStimulantHigh.stages.terminal.label: terminal
LanguageData.UkuphilaResurrection.label: ukuphila resurrection
LanguageData.UkuphilaResurrection.description: This person was resurrected with ukuphila herb.
LanguageData.ZhivayaWaterAddiction.label: zhivaya water need
LanguageData.ZhivayaWaterAddiction.description: This person needs regular zhivaya water doses.
LanguageData.ZhivayaWaterAddiction.stages.unmet.label: unmet
LanguageData.ZhivayaWaterHigh.label: zhivaya water
LanguageData.ZhivayaWaterHigh.description: Zhivaya water in the organism. It allows person to withstand injuries and diseases that otherwise would be lethal and keeps them alive after resurrection. Without regular doses they will die, even if they first took zhivaya water during lifetime.
LanguageData.ZhivayaWaterHigh.stages.animation.label: animation
